## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9aaa15f8740a436b59266355d59bb470dfd605d6260dc307a40ef50e20f65939)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'heft-storybook-react-tutorial' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
